website_summaries.verdict: This heavily reviewed product has proven itself reliable and protective despite its surprisingly affordable price.
pros: Seat is constructed to keep child rear-facing for up to 40 lbs and forward-facing for up to 65 lbs
Rigorously crash tested to meet U.S. safety standards
cons: Customers have issues tightening both the installation and the shoulder straps

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son didn’t like the infant car seat I had thought him when he was born. But he absolutely loves the seat. You will definitely want to make sure that the bottom is positioned for the reclining position when it’s rear facing. It’s a bit bulky in a small car but definitely worth it for your childs safety.
customer_reviews.author: Paige schlager

customer_reviews.title: kept my daughter safe
customer_reviews.text: My husband had someone turn out in front of him driving my daughter home from the sitters. He was doing 45 and barely had time to brake. The airbags deployed and our car did a 180. The other car got driven across two lanes of traffic and into a light pole. Both cars were totaled. The seatbelt stretched and my daughter's seat tilted way over but it held and the only marks on her were on her legs from the harness. She was perfectly fine. Very thankful for this seat.
customer_reviews.author: L. Montrosse

customer_reviews.title: Proven wrong from negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: I love the durability of this product as well as how easy it is to install. Yes, it is big & it might be “bulky.” But you know what? It’ll hold a potential 65 pound child at a point so it needs to be big. It’s actuallt really easy to install if you take the time to read the manual and/or watch videos on how to install it. I was skeptical about buying it due to negative reviews but went ahead anyways because Graco is a great brand. Very impressed with this $83 seat that can rear face for up to 40 pounds. Recommended for sure! Only downfall is that it arrived with some small stains.
customer_reviews.author: WhatTheJNell

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Well made. Easy to install. Made with non cheap material. Looks great. Comfortable. Edit: I took off one star after taking the car seat for a ride because there's no head support when the baby falls asleep. I was worried about the size because we have a very small car (Hyundai Elentra). But it fit just like the infant car seat that our son grew out of. So if you worry that it may be a bit big for your car, don't worry. We're first time parents and installing was super easy. Car seat manual was easy and well explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: Leilabird

customer_reviews.title: Nice but way too big
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this seems like a really sturdy carseat and is very cute but it is HUGE! I have a Honda Pilot and there was no way this would fit in a rear facing position without taking away a lot of the front row leg space and even forward facing it took up a lot of space. I am a tall person (5'11) and so is my husband (6'5) so we need all the leg room we can get and unfortunately this carseat was just too bulky. I sent it back and have had no problems returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome investment.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product on July 5th 2015. It is August 29th 2018 and I still have this car seat, my daughter still uses and it still looks new. It is a little difficult to take apart to clean but once you do it once, it is easy the other times. My daughter now uses it as a forward facing booster seat and the only reason I'm getting a booster seat with 5 point harness is because this is a little bulky for my new car. This is a great investment to have. My daughter used this from birth and is now 3 years old!
customer_reviews.author: Trice

customer_reviews.title: This seat was impossible to install. The straps were ...
customer_reviews.text: This seat was impossible to install. The straps were so difficult to tighten and neither my husband or I could pull them tight enough for the seat to be safe. I returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: We haven't been in a wreck, so I have no idea how well this thing performs. But from a practical standpoint, it's one of the most frustrating products I've ever owned. It's massive and difficult to install and uninstall. Every time I have to remove this from my car, I have to give myself a little pep talk. The strap and syncing mechanism are IMPOSSIBLE to get loose. I bought a different car seat for a second car and didn't have either of these problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Koger

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but strap adjustment a problem for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for when and if I needed to transport any of my grandkids. Sadly I did not know much about car seats when buying. We have 3 grandkids all within the weight/age range of this car seat. The problem comes in with having to take the car seat in and out of my vehicle to adjust the straps and wish I'd known to buy a product with easily adjustable straps, as I am not strong enough to keep installing/uninstalling this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Grum

customer_reviews.title: Very good carseat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice seat. It is comfortable and the straps adjust easily and my daughter loves the cup holders. Having not been in an accident I cannot comment on the performance of it but I feel safe having her in it. My only complain is that the seat itself is huge. I have a Kia Sportage, so not a small car, and still I have to have my passenger seat scooted way forward to fit this seat in. It is in it's rear facing position right now so I'm hoping when she is ready to turn forward facing that might give us a bit more wiggle room.
customer_reviews.author: Izzygirl

customer_reviews.title: 2 years and still going like new
customer_reviews.text: We've had this car seat for 2 years. We kept our daughter rear facing until almost 40 lbs. I do not typically review a product until a lot of use has been achieved. I would highly recommend this seat and we will buy another one for our next child just like it. Highly recommend. It does take some extra time to do the latch install but worth it for safety. That is why I gave it 4 stars for install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: This is enormous! How it is possible to have a 5 lb infant in this is beyond me! My 4 month old looks so small and there is little to no head support in this model! The buckle between the legs seems short so they hit her legs funny and make her sit in a frog like position... not sure how safe this seat could be with such little support. Once you take the infant insert out the padding is super thin also.
customer_reviews.author: Chad T Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat! We had a carrying one that we used but she’s 10 months old and almost walking! She needed a big girl seat. We looked at many options before settling on this one. This has a high standard of side and front impact crashes plus has added padding to help the straps fit perfectly and comfortable on the child’s chest. The color is rich and bright. The material is soft and easy to wipe clean. Straps are easy to take off and adjust if they don’t fit as the child grows.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Family 5

customer_reviews.title: I hate this car seat and wish I still had time ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate this car seat and wish I still had time to return it. The straps are seriously IMPOSSIBLE to get tight enough (and my daughter is relatively small.) I feel like I have to start 20 minutes before I want to leave every day, just to make sure she is in this dumb seat securely.
customer_reviews.author: FP

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I give 2 stars because my son hates sitting in it. He finds it very uncomfortable. It’s probably one of the largest car seats I’ve ever seen and we can’t seem to keep it upright. Maybe it’s personal error but I definitely wouldn’t suggest this car seat or buy another for my newborns despite all its pros.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Witzel

customer_reviews.title: Good car seat, some things that bug me.
customer_reviews.text: So this seems like a good car seat. but upon installing in our sedan, its pretty tall, which makes getting our 18 month old into it hard when its rear-facing. Also. in the instructions it tells you if you can't get it leveled right, to use a towel to stuff under the seat and get right. huh? That seems a little strange, especially for a big brand that is charging you almost $100. And I actually have to do this to get it leveled right.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Salazar

customer_reviews.title: no thank you
customer_reviews.text: Has per my husband... it was a huge pain in the ass to install. Super hard to tighten the lower safety straps.. seemed overall comfy for kiddo. Fyi 2020 nissan altimas dont have the 3rd safety point for rear point of contact.
customer_reviews.author: Soli

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this car seat
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is huge! I bought two of them one for my car and one for my husband and returned both of them. I have a 2017 ford explore and it hardly fit in my car. I would not recommend this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Marlise

customer_reviews.title: Straps won't tighten
customer_reviews.text: I like most of the features of this seat, but I had a major issue with the straps. They were impossible to tighten enough to fit my child safely. She is 19 pounds, so it should would for her. I ended up sending it back to the manufacturer under the warranty. I am going to order a different model since it seems other people have had the same problem. The rest of the features are fine and kuddos to Graco customer support for taking care of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: SDubGold

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER GREAT BUY!! It’s affordable and actually a good car seat. My 1 yr old is too long for the infant carrier and I noticed there was a little discomfort when my baby was in it. I did not have a lot to buy a new car seat, and I found this on amazon. This car seat is comfortable and accommodating for growth. I’m very pleased. It was easy to adjust and install.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Would 100% buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this for my massive 10 month old. Was looking for affordability and safety. Well I’m happy to say we absolutely love this car seat!!! It’s light weight, easy to install, my son who has hated car seats since birth actually likes this one! And from what I can see it’s very well built/safe. It’s a good size (looks more narrow in the pictures than in person) and squishy but not dangerously so. I’m not normally one to write reviews but I wanted to shout out how awesome this car seat is. 10/10 would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Hively's

customer_reviews.title: Best seat out there. Easy to install, comfortable, SAFE.
customer_reviews.text: My oldest had this seat and rear-faced from 8 months until 4 years old. I loved it so much, mostly due to easy installation and comfortability for her, that I bought this one for my next baby. She's going on 2, and our rear facing game is just as strong. I feel good knowing my kids are safe in these.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect height information
customer_reviews.text: The height limit of 49 inches has to be incorrect. Maybe it was a typo by the company on the Q&A. The child’s head is supposed to be at least 1 inch below the head rest. My daughter just turned 3 and is 31 pounds so well within the weight limit BUT her head is almost to the top of the seat and she isn’t close to 49 inches! She is literally maybe 39 inches tops!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat, super cute and comfortable for baby! There isn't the head rest thing that sits on each side of the baby's head. My girls are one, so they can hold their heads up, it just seems like it would be more comfortable when they fall asleep (I could probably try and find an attachment for it). Also, it is quite a bit larger than I expected, it is probably normal size for a convertible car seat, but I didn't think about it. Still a great car seat tho, and I am satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this car set for our 1.5 year old. I really wish this car seat worked because I like the design and comfort of it. Install is not easy, the strap to tighten the anchors is impossible. Once we got that figured out we put our child in the car seat and tried to tighten the harness and that too was almost impossible to tighten. I will be looking for another brand car seat to purchase
customer_reviews.author: katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Installation is harder than it should ever be
customer_reviews.text: It’s literally impossible to get this thing to a tightness that feels remotely safe. I’ve stood on the car seat while tugging the tightening strap and it doesn’t budge. Once you finally get it installed you never want to touch it again. Our old one had a tightening lever that worked flawlessly. Two stars for poor strap engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Turbojacket

customer_reviews.title: Nice Large Carseat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this seat as a replacement, front-facing car seat. It was a little hard to install due to the positioning. However, once it was in, it was pretty comfortable for her. The sides come up a little more, which appears to be a lot more comfortable when she falls asleep. It is larger, so be forewarned that it may not fit on all seats. It appears that it will be easy to adjust as she grows. I would not say this is a seat you want to take in and out. It is best for permanent placement. I only took off a star due to the difficulty getting it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you GRACO!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Graco for making car seats that make us feel safe! Keeping our little ones safe is the most important thing we can do. I’ve had this for couple/few months now, so it’s been tested well. Easy to install, comfortable, easy clean up and she is growing constantly. Grateful adjusting straps is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful carseat
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd graco my ride carseat we've purchased because we like them so much. They're a little wide, so 2 of them take up the whole backseat of my nissan versa, but that's to be expected with most carseats in small vehicles. They click easily, and my kiddos will be in them for many years to come, so I feel it was a good investment over buying infant carseats just to have to replace them for a convertible seat later. They've also got cup holders, they don't hold all sizes of cups, but they're good for snacks and thinner cups.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT recommend this seat! It was a NIGHTMARE trying to get it installed....it literally took the strength of 3 grown men to get it tightened and it still did not feel right. The hooks seemed like they would not hold in an impact....just metal clamps that took 15-30 minutes of frustration trying to hook & unhook.....couldn't deal with it & did not feel stable & secure so it was returned. I would not recommend this car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Iluv2read

customer_reviews.title: Fits smaller cars with out seat being all up
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2012 Toyota Camry and this fits perfect! My daughter ia a very petite 20 month old. She is barely 20lbs so I really could pick anything rear facing and it will last awhile. I chose this because I do have a small sedan. It fits great and was very sinple to install. Also feels very sturdy once installed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sorry I bought this car seat because of two things: first and most importantly, I find it INCREDIBLY difficult to tighten the belt. I use all of my strength and it still won’t get as tight as I want it to be. Secondly, the waist buckle is too low which causes the plastic parts of the latches to push into my daughter’s legs as she grows (she just turned two).
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey R

customer_reviews.title: We've got one for each car
customer_reviews.text: We've got two of these and they're pretty nice. Installs easily, though out of the car they're a bit heavy and bulky. Both seats sit level in our vehicles without any futzing. Cleaning is pretty simple: remove the padding, rinse it off and toss it in the washing machine. Gotta say I don't really love the extra, removable padding but that's easily remedied: take 'em off and don't use 'em.
customer_reviews.author: merklm

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended...
customer_reviews.text: This was a secondary seat for the grandparents car. Not crazy about the installation of this seat. We have a Peg Perego Convertibl, Britax Pinnacle and Graco Atlas Booster and those are a breeze to install. I would not recommend this seat. It's also unnecessarily wide and my daughter is 2 and she was almost at the height limit. Theres better out there.
customer_reviews.author: CarGuy71

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: We love this carseat! It's definitely a good value for the price, but so far we have found it to be extremely structurally sturdy and reliable. You can loosen the straps once it is installed; however, you cannot move the straps up once it is in place. Overall, our daughter seems to be comfortable in this and enjoys riding. Also, though tight, it does fit in my 04 Jeep cherokee (I had read reviews that it didn't fit in some smaller SUVs but have not found this to be the case). Both my husband and I have this carseat and are extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb grizzle

customer_reviews.title: My kids can sleep without their head slumped forward!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I’ve purchased the My Ride 65. I’ve had one for all 3 kids because it’s the best! I’ve purchased 12 different car seats, ranging from $500 - $100. I couldn’t find one that wouldn’t allow my kids heads to fall forward while they slept. Since my kids immediately fall asleep, this was a crucial selling point. I recommend this seat to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: A. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this seat. My 6 mo is much happier in this seat than the old baby carrier seat, we got one for each vehicle and it fits the standard cab truck (2017 Chevy Silverado) with a small backseat (although if we weren’t short it would probably be too big) and my SUV back seat behind the passenger seat, it’s big but not too big, and my little one seems perfectly comfortable. Buy this if you need a quality lesser expensive car seat 👍
customer_reviews.author: Savannasmiles

customer_reviews.title: Good car seat for the price
customer_reviews.text: We needed an extra car seat for my mother's car when she has my son and didn't want to spend $400 on another car seat that he may only use a couple times a month. This was really affordable and my 15 month old seems comfy in it. I took away a star because the installation was a NIGHTMARE and very difficult. It is also pretty bulky rear facing so if you have a smaller car like a Corolla and are very tall, you may need a different car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Click it or ticket
customer_reviews.text: We love this carseat. I really like how wide it is around my sons head......although I don't think this feature would be the best in a smaller car. Especially if you have other carseat in the back with it. My one and only complaint I have with this carseat is that it is really hard to tighten the straps at times. LOVE that is has built in cup holders and not just the ones that clip to the side of it.
customer_reviews.author: nickie1252

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat and great price
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I’ve spent so much on car seats in the past. I got this for a second car seat and it is so nice and my daughter fits in it well and I can’t believe the price. Easy to install. Similar to most convertibles and really cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great car seat. It was easy to install with the tether system. I even had to take it apart and wash it about a week after purchasing because my son dumped his formula all over it, and it was easy to wash and put back on! My only con is the size of it. Yes it is comfortable for my son, but it takes up sooo much room in my backseat along with my other sons highback booster that no one could sit in the middle, granted, I do drive a tiny Nissan Versa. Other than that, it is a good well made seat that I feel very confident putting my son in!
customer_reviews.author: Julie S.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the colors but just too many cons for me.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. It is massive. Much wider than my other car seats. I have a midsize suv and it just took up so much space. I also don't like that it only has two recline positions and it is VERY tall when say up in the upright position. Like uncomfortably tall. Too tall to get my toddler up into it. It also doesn't have an easy way to adjust the shoulder straps. You have to pull the whole thing out, undo the straps, and feed them back through the hole you want. Too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: N. T.

customer_reviews.title: My Baby LOVES this Seat
customer_reviews.text: We just switched her from a baby carrier to this convertible seat and she LOVES it, falls asleep in it easily, I love the color (though I wish there were more pink since the majority is the infant insert), it was easy to install and very sturdy. LOVE, LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Cool McClurkin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable car seat
customer_reviews.text: This car seat works great for our baby girl, she loves it and so do we. It provides safety and comfort while riding. Especially b/c it leans back a little bit not just sitting straight up so it makes it easier for her to sleep while riding in the car. Would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Free

customer_reviews.title: Look no further 4 your precious cargo!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this car seat so much, we bought the exact same one for our other vehicle a few weeks later. Although, the price had increased a bit by then. We are still very happy with this car seat! Would definitely recommend for any parents transitioning out of a newborn car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Peach

customer_reviews.title: Its Alright for a Cheap Carseat
customer_reviews.text: Very basic. I have another car seat and bought this for the grandparents. Everything on this model is of lower quality and isn't as nice as the other model that I have. For the price and to keep the LO safe, it works, but if you can afford more, I would spend extra to get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, reliable product time after time!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased three of these over the past 4 years, one for each of our vehicles...after getting annoyed at having to move them around from car to car. They're consistently well-made, and have fit our little one from being a baby to now being a 4 year old who thinks she doesn't need a car seat :)
customer_reviews.author: Straight Outta the Suburbs

customer_reviews.title: Secure well made product at a great cost!
customer_reviews.text: Really good product! Was looking for a product for a second vechicle that was cost effient but still offered great safety for my daughter. Is it pretty easy to adjust straps for the right size. The easy latch release to loosening and tighten should straps make is easy getting her in and out of the vechicle. It isn't anything fancy but it feels well made and she feels snug and secure. My only complaint would be the in the forward facing option the latching straps are not long enough the latch in to the seat of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Love it! We have several!
customer_reviews.text: We initially just bought one to have in my car. My mom babysits several days a week so instead of moving it back and forth she bought one to keep in her car as well. Now that our daughter is officially too small for the bucket seat, we got one for my husband to bring in and out of his work truck for the preschool run and pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty standard but on the large side
customer_reviews.text: Pretty standard car seat. It’s a little bigger so we use it in our SUV. My Son is 18 months old and in the 99 percentile for height and weight do leg room is going to be sparse for a rear facing seat. It is a little tough to loosen the shoulder straps compared to our other car seat. And it leaves the same marks on his thought, unless he’s wearing a shirt with a collar or a hoodie.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS CAR SEAT ITS NOT SAFE!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS CARSEAT !!!!! My daughter is still rear facing, when I purchased this car seat, I was under the impression that it came with a base. I was wrong. This car seat has NO base. It has a hole for the seat belt to go through for rear facing babies, I properly installed my daughters car seat rear facing. I was making a turn, and the entire car seat fell over onto its side. I do not recommend buying this car seat at all, it was honestly a disappointment because graco car seats are usually the brand I feel safest using for my children.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: This seat saved my granddaughter's life.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this seat for my granddaughter because she grew out of her last one. She will be 2 years old in a month. They were visiting us and left to return home the day the seat arrived. A few weeks after they returned home, 2 days ago, they were in a major accident and my daughter's care was totaled. They were rear ended and my little granddaughter was pushed in her seat into the front seat. The seat was also totaled but worked to keep her safe. I can't say enough about how much I love this seat. She also loved it. Lots of room and great looking but what matters is it did its job.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne sculley

customer_reviews.title: Very big and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This car seat was a little hard for me to install correctly but my husband easily installed it. It’s very large which bothered me at first but i think it seems sturdier than a lot of smaller convertible seats I’ve looked at in stores. My daughter also loves the cup holders :) the cushions make it very comfy. I’m sure this car seat will last us a few years until we move her to a booster!
customer_reviews.author: RC 2006

customer_reviews.title: We love them. Patterns are nice
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 8 My Ride 65 carseats (2 kids, my car, my husbands car and a caregivers car... and 2 replacements due to an accident). We love them. Patterns are nice. They clean fairly well. My only complaint is the difficulty in installing and removing the seats. Sometimes I can't even push the button to loosen the latch strap to remove the seat, which is necessary to clean the padding when someone has an accident. I consider this a minor problem and obviously not enough to make me not like the seats!
customer_reviews.author: Katie D.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat!! I upgraded my 1 and a half year old to this from the infant car seat and I just love it! No neck falling down while she sleeps, it has a great recline to it for sleeping but still upright enough for when she's awake. Love the high sides. Only Con I'd say is that you need alot of room in the back seat to fit this car seat because of the recline to it. It fits my Minivan great. But a little tight in a crew cab truck.
customer_reviews.author: christopher caton

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Shocking how bad this seat is and terrifying how many people are OK with sticking their kids in it. Try a Chicco and you will feel the same. I tried a Graco that was twice this price and it was just as bad. Impossible to secure
customer_reviews.author: JustnJoy

customer_reviews.title: We have a super expensive Britax
customer_reviews.text: We have a super expensive Britax, but this Graco is really the car seat I prefer! It is so much easier to take in and out and much more light weight. It doesn't have the little pads on the straps that go around their neck, but you can purchase those easily and add them. And it has cupholders, which do come in handy. Overall, I think it seems like a sturdy carseat and very much worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: B. Parker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is big in the middle of our van rear facing. The front seat passenger can't be tall
customer_reviews.author: Allen P.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get if your car doesn’t have safety hooks.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 96 forunner and it’s so too heavy if you can’t hook it in. The car seat will move when I turn. I shouldn’t have to have a newer car for a car seat to be safe for my child. Will be emailing Graco.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Beaumier

customer_reviews.title: Good car seat
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husbands car since he just picks baby up from sitters and comes home with her. Fits in his 98 Pontiac Sunfire in the back just fine. Works great for use in a second car.
customer_reviews.author: Bbyrd

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: I was given a free one and loved it so much I decided to buy a new one for my second child. Both my children can sit in it very conforatable and most important, it has a great recline feature that allows my children to nap withoout their heads going forward. It has ample room to sit and depending on the car you put it in (we have a mini-van), it has decent leg room. I would definately recommend this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Longstreth

customer_reviews.title: A little taller than I'd like
customer_reviews.text: Great product and baby can sleep... and he loves it. Only complaint is it blocks my blindspot a little and only fits in my suv and not my nissian sentra rear facing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and theyre wonderful! I do love the added cup holders on either side of them so we dont have to worry as much about spilled juice in the car since the kiddos just put their cups back in them when they're done.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: In comparison to other carseats, this is still up to the excellence of other Graco carseats and is an excellent price. Comfortable for my daughter to sit in and reach her cup holder. the only thing I wish was the hooks were button push like the 4ever seat, but as long as you aren't constantly taking it out and putting it back in, it isn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: K. Michelle Crick

customer_reviews.title: Great for small vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Love the extended rear facing weight limit and high forward facing harness limit. Makes a great long time use seat between infant seat and high back booster seat. The recline and shorter design make it great for smaller vehicles
customer_reviews.author: MrsWaldron

customer_reviews.title: Once install was figured out, not a bad seat.
customer_reviews.text: Almost returned this item because I couldn't get it installed. Like many other reviews here, the seat latch system would not tighten. After googling the problem, I found many posting about the "trick" to installing this seat: take the cover partially off, thread the latch belt through the hole by the cup holder and pull up to tighten. Now I can't get the seat out of the car! I've tried and tried. But it's a nice seat, baby likes it, easy to get her in and out and she falls asleep in it every time. I like that there are cup holders and on both sides (I'm a south paw and always appreciate when products don't just assume right handedness).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a small carseat
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar carseat I purchased for my son. We purchased this one so we had a smaller carseat but sadly this is not a small car seat. The back area is huge and reminds me of a sea shell. Overall it's still a very sturdy carseat and easy to install just not small
customer_reviews.author: SqueakyGabs

customer_reviews.title: Good car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this car seat. But it is EXTREMELY tall! If your putting it in a truck then it’s great but anything else other than a truck and front facing it is way too tall! Had to order a different one for my Jeep Wrangler because the front seat ended up stationed at the dashboard.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Decided to go with this seat to fit three across, a booster and two convertibles, in the back of a Kia Soul. We got a traditional infant carrier for my husband car and in comparison to this seat it is horrible. Our sons seems very secure in this seat. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Jones

customer_reviews.title: Carseat
customer_reviews.text: Always love Graco carseats, this didn't disappoint. Cute design, easy(ish) install... I mean it is a carseat, can't make those too easy to install 🙄 straps adjust easily to get the right fit for baby and she seems comfy in there based on the way she consistently passes out in it
customer_reviews.author: AmandaM

customer_reviews.title: Great but wished it reclined more
customer_reviews.text: I like that my grandson had plenty of room to grow with this seat. It seems to be comfortable for him but it doesn’t recline as much as I’d like in the rear facing position. The cup holders are very handy. My son installed mine because I couldn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Coco’s Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Large seat, good quality
customer_reviews.text: We just installed this car seat in my Honda Element and it is great so far! My car has a very large back seat so the bulkiness of the car seat doesn't bother us. The seat only has to recline positions so the more laid back one was the only option for my rear facing 18 month old. It is at about a 45 degree angle in my car but it's fine. My daughter loves to sleep in the car, so that recline is perfect for her. So far we haven't had any issues with this seat. Easy to install and easy to buckle and pull tight on my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Z.

customer_reviews.title: East to install
customer_reviews.text: Really Good Car Seat easy to install and easy to clean would recommend for sure
customer_reviews.author: Oneata Hicks

customer_reviews.title: I love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat. It is my second one. The cup holders are great. When my toddler naps, her head relaxes back- rather than falling forward, like it did with a previous car seat. I was able to take the cover off to wash. I would however only do that if necessary. It was a slight struggle to get off, but putting it back on was much easier. The straps do not twist, like they have with a previous car seat. I feel my toddler is safe in this.
customer_reviews.author: TRACIE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: From the safety standpoint, I couldn’t ask for anything any better and this is possibly the easiest car seat I have ever installed and UNINSTALLED which with any other car seat is a pain
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat, just VERY large
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat! It's a quite a bit bigger than I expected, and pulling the adjusting strap can be a little difficult at times but overall it's a great design. Nice recline too, I hate it when their heads fall forward and it just doesn't happen with this seat. Update- a down side I've found after owning for a while is that the fabric stains easily. If they spill anything on it it leaves a great big water mark. I feel like I'm washing it out all the time just so it doesn't look all dirty.
customer_reviews.author: K P

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The price makes this transition seat reasonable. It needs a bit of work tho. The snap in mechanism does not mange the seat quite snug enough for my liking. The shoulder straps would never do for a smaller infant in my opinion and I have a 9 month old. Have difficulty even with the straps on a high setting getting them to stay in place when tightened. Comfy in seat, have cup holders, could use a removable bar across the seat for dangling toys.
customer_reviews.author: Aymber

customer_reviews.title: Good seat for the price but....
customer_reviews.text: The seat is good for the price but very difficult to adjust. you have to take the seat out of the car, undo some plastic clips to adjust the straps, there is no easy head rest adjustment, and if you get it wrong you have to take it all out and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Cs Mowers

customer_reviews.title: Not for small cars.
customer_reviews.text: This car seat does the job but it is huge. My husband has a Nissan Pathfinder and this car seat fits so tightly in the back seat I can't believe how big this car seat is compared to mine. I have the Greco forever car seat so if you are familiar with the size of that 1 just know that this one is much bigger and if you have a small car I would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: ShaSha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this car seat for our son. We absolutely love it!! The positive sides are it is very spacious and comfortable (at least our son always looks as though he is comfy and tends to fall asleep faster in this then his crib), there are two larger sizes cup holders, and once you figure out how to change the straps/harness, then it's simple. I would say the only negative would be it does take up a lot of room in the car. Either way, we love this product. Thanks Graco!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Dreikosen

customer_reviews.title: Love our Car seat
customer_reviews.text: We love our car seat! I had one with my first daughter and loved it so much we bought another. My daughter is a little small and seemed to not fit the other brand we initially had. She fits perfectly in here with the insert. Car seat installs easy.
customer_reviews.author: tabetha

customer_reviews.title: It's 'ok' in every category.  Does seem safe.
customer_reviews.text: Padding is a little thin. But it installs ok, despite not having one of those new style ratchets to tighten. Acceptable functionality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ladyrose8303

customer_reviews.title: Fits in my Nissan Sentra
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid this car seat would not fit in my car and afraid I would have to return it, but it fits fine. Keep in mind I am 5'3" so I keep the seat pushed forward pretty far, so it is easier to fit the car seat in my back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Good seat, but very bulky.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a seat for the grandparents to use. I love that it has such a weight range and we won't have to buy one for every stage, especially since they will only use it a few times a year. It seems very comfortable and sturdy. However it is VERY bulky. We used it in a Passat, Escape, and a pick up truck. The seat either has to be buckled into the middle seat or the seat in front of it has to be moved very far up. It's a great seat, but not for anyone with a smaller sedan or regular cab truck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat and so does my 1 year old. It is a little too big to be in the middle of my back seat while rear facing, so I had to put it on the side and move my seat further up.(which for me isn't an issue since I'm 4'11) if you have a small car like mine, (Saturn ion) you may want to consider a smaller seat if you are rear facing. Otherwise, the seat is very easy to install, and my LO seems so comfortable in it. We really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Better car seats out there than this one
customer_reviews.text: I personally hate this car seat. Hard to tighten the straps. Sits tilted back too far with no way to adjust the seat. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Safe and comfortable ride!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for my granddaughter so she would be safer in the car. She loves her new car seat. When she falls asleep it’s recline just enough that she stays comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this car seat. The way our seats in our van are made they have a lean to them where they seat will sit. Because of this most car seats would end up sitting up too straight for our liking with a baby under 1 year. I read all the reviews for this one and looked at tons of pictures. It sits so well in our van. My baby is finally properly seated in the car. Love the simple clean design. This seat literally cradles my baby!!
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Fine if you never need to move it or share the back seat.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: cheap and basically functional. Cons: nightmare to adjust straps or move around. Overall: if you have only one car seat and never need to move it, or get into a third row and have an hour to adjust it every time the kid grows, it’s fine. If you need versatility or compact size or convenience, find something else. It’s wide and hard to use/install.
customer_reviews.author: BootstrapJohnny

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Fit in 2016 Toyota Corolla
customer_reviews.text: Extremely loose fit in rear facing mode. No matter how tight you get the latch or belt it still shakes 10-12 inches from left to right. Poor design. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Help me
customer_reviews.text: Nanny get me out. I understand children of today are smart and can get in anything. Getting them out in a nightmare for the buckles are impossible for my Arthritic hands. I had to spend more money on a tool to help me get them out. What's a nanny to do?
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this car seat for our toddler
customer_reviews.text: We bought this seat 6 months ago for our 2.5 year old and have been very happy with it. She seems very comfortable in it and it fits nicely rear-facing in the seat of our van, but we have had to turn it forward in some smaller cars in order to keep from having the front seats slid forward too much. My husband never has any trouble installing it with the latch system, although I've had a little more difficulty getting it tight enough myself. We like the color scheme and the design quite a bit and plan on passing it down to our youngest son once our daughter outgrows it :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rabe

customer_reviews.title: A+ and safe
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Seems comfortable and the extra head pad is nice though doesn't stay put sometimes. A+
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky and not secure enough
customer_reviews.text: I can tell why this car seat was so affordable. It is unnecessarily bulky. The top of the car seat is very wide and would make it hard to fit multiple car seats/people in the back seat together. So if you have more than one kid, it may not be the best choice. Also, no matter how tightly I secured the latch strap, the seat just did not seem secure enough, too much wiggle. Not nearly as secure and stable as my previous Chicco brand car seat. I returned and will be purchasing a different car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Gilmer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and nice looking but..
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit on the heavy side and it is also wider than other seats. Takes up too much space width wise. Otherwise, nice.
customer_reviews.author: Khaled Elajam

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes her new seat!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after our baby seemed to hate carrier car seat. Our little one seems much more comfortable. I really like that it’s adjustable and will last her throughout her toddler-hood. Great seat for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it better than the second seat I have
customer_reviews.text: I have two different car seats, one in each car. This one works better. All car seats are somewhat annoying and difficult to use, but this one is about as easy as is possible.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rau

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2015 Hyundai elentra this car seat fits well in the backseat however makes the passenger slightly cramped in the front. The car seat is easy to install, and sturdy. I wish it had more padding in it and little pads on the straps. But for the price it’s a good deal, so if you’re on a budget. 👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great price and very nice car seat! It was easy to install and the instruction manual is in English (separate Spanish booklet included) with REAL words and not just pictures. I love the fact that it will it is adaptable for rear or front facing and will last my grandchild through many years of growth. It is attractive and the fabric is good quality and durable. The cup holders are very convenient. Nicely engineered!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great convertible car seat
customer_reviews.text: My baby was getting too tall for her infant car seat but wasn't ready to be in a forward facing seat so I bought this convertible one so I wouldn't have to keep buying her car seats. It's cute and my baby seems to enjoy it much more than her previous one. It's roomy for her, seems comfortable, and she loves the cup holders. I definitely recommend this seat.
customer_reviews.author: KC

product_meta.title: Graco My Ride 65 Convertible Car Seat, Sully
product_meta.description:
Color:SullyHelp keep your growing child secure in the Graco My Ride 65 convertible car seat, in Sully. The American Academy of Pediatrics recommends your child ride rear-facing up to two years of age, so My Ride 65 keeps your baby rear-facing up to 40 pounds. (infant car seats) and forward-facing until 65 pounds. (as a toddler car seat). The seat is also LATCH-equipped, Side Impact Tested, and features convenient integrated cup holders. Machine-washable seat cushion.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Keeps your baby rear facing up to 40 pounds (in baby car seat mode), longer than most other car seats in the US; The American Academy of Pediatrics recommends you keep your child rear facing as long as possible
Keeps your forward facing child harnessed up to 65 pounds. Dual cup holders present
Rigorously crash tested to meet or exceed U.S. safety standards and help reassure safety conscious parents
Engineered and crash tested to meet or exceed US standard FMVSS 213
In addition to meeting or exceeding all applicable US safety standards, the My Ride 65 has been side impact tested for occupant retention by the harness system.Harness straps may be spot cleaned

The American Academy of Pediatricians (AAP) and National Highway Safety Administration (NHTSA) recommend that children ride rear facing until the age of 2 or until they reach the maximum rear-facing height or weight rating for their seat, and when forward-facing, children should use the built-in harness system for as long as possible until they reach the maximum forward-facing weight or height for their car seat.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,758 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
